snippet: Two Americans are among the dead from a suicide vest detonated by a member of the Afghan intelligence. In a separate episode, Afghan officials say three children were killed in a coalition airstrike.
abstract: Afghan and American officials say that member of Afghan intelligence service detonated suicide vest, killing two Americans and four Afghan intelligence colleagues; Afghan officials also charge that coalition strike against aTaliban target had killed three young children.

byline.original: By ALISSA J. RUBIN and TAIMOOR SHAH

lead_paragraph: Two Americans are among the dead from a suicide vest detonated by a member of the Afghan intelligence. In a separate episode, Afghan officials say three children were killed in a coalition airstrike.

headline.seo: Suicide ‘Insider’ Attack Kills Six in Afghanistan
headline.main: Suicide ‘Insider’ Attack Kills Six in Afghanistan
headline.print_headline: Suicide ‘Insider’ Attack Kills Six in Afghanistan
